price: 82. Pero si (los idólatras) se alejan (de ti, ¡oh, Muhammad!, debes saber que) tu misión es solamente transmitirles con claridad el mensaje (de Al-lah y no puedes obligarlos a seguirlo).
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
